H0.text: Which type of animal was Robin Hood in the Disney cartoon film 'Robin Hood'. Rabbit

H1.text: Which type of animal was Robin Hood in the Disney cartoon film 'Robin Hood'. Squirrel

H2.text: Which type of animal was Robin Hood in the Disney cartoon film 'Robin Hood'. Hedgehog

H3.text: Which type of animal was Robin Hood in the Disney cartoon film 'Robin Hood'. Fox

A4.text: Robin Hood is portrayed as a red fox.
